title: Welcome to my new portfolio!
content: I finally migrated my portfolio to a static site hosted on GitHub Pages. It's much faster and easier to maintain. Stay tuned for new artwork updates every week!

title: My Inking Process
content:
A lot of people ask me about my inking tools. I primarily use a **G-Pen nib** for dynamic lines and **Microns** for detailed background work. 

Here is a quick breakdown of my workflow:
1. Rough pencils (blue lead)
2. Tight pencils
3. Inking main characters
4. Backgrounds
